page.title: 15EMPLOYMENT
page.content: Agriculture is the largest employer and land user in the area and is mainly pastural for dairy farming and cereal crops. The main industrial employer is the chemical works in Woodend Green which makes wholesale chemicals for agriculteral business.A minor employer is the sewage works to the south-east of Cambridge. Also there are two coal merchants: one is A.E.Tudor and Son and the other Dursley Coal Merchant Limited who are both minor distributers. The site of the old hammer mill is now a granary under the name of Coaley mill.It used to sharpen and make hammers,axes,etc.The site has been used as a mill since pre-thirteenth century and is still used to gring corn today.
